channel.title: Grant Seasons on Optimism Grants Council

item.title: Season 7
item.description:
Season 7: Retrospective

Season 7 of the Optimism Grants Council has concluded. Submissions closed on July 15th, 2024.

Season 7 Highlights

  • Total Grants Awarded: 47
  • Total Funding Distributed: $2.8M
  • Applications Received: 312
  • Success Rate: 15%

Key Focus Areas

Season 7 prioritized:

Season 8 â€“ Grants Council

The Grants Council is granting to projects that increase interop adoption in the Optimism ecosystem.
